wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Michael Frederick Hobbs  (born 28 February 1937) is a former commander in the British Army and now a charity director and Governor of the Military Knights of Windsor.

response: *2000: Major-General Sir Michael Hobbs, KCVO CBE

* Michael Hobbs (rugby union) (born 1987), New Zealand rugby union player
*Michael Hobbs (British Army officer) (born 1937), British Army major general
